reviews.review: Another wonderful entry in the Portal series and what a funny ride it is my second playthrough,
I thought Portal 1 was hard, but yet again Portal 2 way harder and more confusing. Cant wait for Portal 3, can you?

尽管我想写一些《传送门2》的优点，好好夸一下这款游戏，但看到测评中的其他大佬以及网络上对《传送门2》的赏析我就知道我没必要写那些。
但《传送门2》真的让我感到震撼。
当年玩完传送门1之后就有很长的一段时间没在玩2，因为我觉得传送门1已经足够优秀，可能2给不了我震撼。但事实还是打了我的脸。
当我穿过开头的房间和披满植被的测试，当我捡到复活GLaDOS并捡到双门传送枪之后，当我击败GLaDOS惠特莉却反水之后，当我和GLaDOS探寻并逃出旧设施之后，当我把门开在月球上之后。
我就被彻底震撼了。
尽管现在我已经玩完了《传送门2》，尽管从剧情上来说《传送门2》已经完结，没有3也是合情合理。但我仍希望传送门系列能有一个3。

A classic, have to have.

Ta gra wymaga użycia szarych komórek, więc nie polecam dla osób które nie lubią myśleć. Ale gra jest bardzo inteligentna i kunszt dobrej gry solo oraz co-op. Przejście gry na 100% nie powinno zająć więcej niż 40h przy spokojnej grze. Pozdrawiam Bartusia z którym przeszedłem co-opa.
игра для людей с iq выше 300.

Valvenin yaptığı Harika Bir Seri ile beraberiz. Portal 2, Half-Life Evreninde geçen bir oyundur Hikayenin görünen kısmını keyifli puzzlelarla uygun fiyata alıp oynayabilirsiniz bir de Hikayenin görünmeyen kısmı var oyunu bitirdikten sonra forumlarda araştırmanızı öneririm çok iyi Hikayesi var oyunun. Oyunun Müthiş bir Co-op sürümü var Arkadaşınız varsa onunla birlikte oynayıp bitirebilirsiniz kesinlikle keyif veren bir moddur. Oyunun Müzikleri Harikulade. Indirim de Portal ve Portal 2 i uygun fıyata alıp bitirin kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.
best puzzle game ive ever played in my life.
fun adventure and i wont miss you
makes extremely fun especially with friends

Probably one of my favourite games if not my favourite of all time. I cannot express how much i appreciate this game. It is genuinely unique in that you cannot find a puzzle game like this anywhere else. Im so sad that Valve never continued this franchise except with mini vr games. Ive played it over countless times and each time i always found something new to appreciate.

 This is going to be more of my personal journey with this game rather than an in depth and objective review.

 My first interaction with this game came from a very small time youtuber called Adkit2. I had previously watched his two LP's on the return to the mysterious island series, which were childhood treasures to me. After that i came across his LP of this mysterious game called Portal 2. It caught my interest as i watched him and his friend Eldric struggle and troll through the  test chambers. I got hooked and i wanted more. Presumably soon after, i discovered a singleplayer LP of this game from another small time youtuber called trasknari. (Both the aforementioned channels have been dead for a few years now) I remember watching his LP and throughly enjoying it as much as the coop, and i probably watched it once more at some point. Even as i play today i can still remember some of his quips after certain events and dialogue. Some time after, i tried to download this game on my dad's macbook. Of course since i was a stupid kid back then i failed miserably and i accidentally broke his laptop somehow by doing so. So yea, not a great first attempt. 

 With the shortage of portal content, i watched a couple of fan films on youtube. And a particular one from Synthetic Picturehaus about Doug Rattman has never left my mind. Its a great short, adapted from the portal comic series online. Definitely worth checking out. After a couple years i nervously asked one evening during dinner if i could get this game on steam. The joy and excitement is not something i will forget when i managed to finally own a copy. 

 Playing it as a kid i obviously had a tough time with some chambers but overall i had a blast. And that was my first playthrough done. Throughout the years i played portal 2 over and over again, each time discovering and appreciating something new. I recently downloaded it again because a friend wanted to play co-op together. I actually hadnt completed co-op before because me and my friends would just give up after a point. This time my other friend had already played through the first stages with someone else. But it was still a blast to complete the rest together. And i guess that could count as a complete playthrough of co-op :D. 

 After that my love for this game got rekindled but since i completed the singleplayer so many times already i found myself stuck. I wanted something new yet familiar. So i went to modDB to see if there were any interesting Portal mods. 

 By the way, i havent mentioned Portal at all. Portal honestly hasnt stuck with me the way the second one has. It still definitely has its charm and i also have completed it a few times but it just feels like a mini tech demo cobbled up from half life assets. (And to be fair that actually kind of what it was meant to be, but i didnt grew quite fond of it) Though i have to give credit for the writers because they managed to create an amazing story that was able to be expanded into something much more. 

 Now back to searching for mods, i found two interesting ones called Portal: Prelude which was about the events right before glados's start-up. And a horror mod called ERROR. Portal: Prelude was pretty challenging but it was a well made mod. ERROR was actuslly suprisingly a pretty decent horror mod. Since the game was ominous already it didnt have to do much to make it even more creepy. After those two experiences i looked for Portal 2 mods. There werent many but i saw Portal Tag and decided to try it. (I had previously watched a playthrough of it, and also Portal Stories: Mel) It was decent but i didnt stick with me.

 I searched for more mods but i found no map/story ones that were interesting. There are two mods coming in the near future that im excited about though. So cheers for that. I found a graphic improvement mod and decided to play the campaign with it once more. I gotta say its a pretty successful mod. It improved the lighting quite a bit and made the game look more vibrant especially in the ruined areas. This was the first time i completed the game in one session and it took me roughly 3 hours perhaps. I once again throughly enjoyed every moment and always remembered my past experiences and memories in certain points of the game. This time i appreciated the humor and wit of the dialogue more, getting a bit older helped. 

 So now that ive given the context to why i appreciate this game and series so much, im going to give a small review.

Graphics: 8/10

 Honestly, i think it looks absolutely spectacular for 2011. And im considering this without the graphics mod. It has its own unique style that im just so much accustomed to. I hold most of the source games dear in this regard. Its become kind of nostalgic really.

Gameplay: 9.5/10

 Pure and simple. But brilliant
Im going to include portal here as well and review the gameplay as a whole concept. Ive honestly found nothing to be close to how unique and fun placing portals and flinging through the air is. Its such a simple concept but it also has endless potential. The entire game is structured around these holes through time and space and it just works brilliantly. And hats off to the original small team of developers who created this concept with another game, before being hired by valve to make portal. Well done.

Story: 9.5/10

The story is simply amazing. From the plot points to the dialogue to the character relations everything is just spot on perfect. With each playthrough i have appreciated it even more, and as i mentioned above i really, really, really enjoy the dialogue. Brilliant writing- always keeps you entertained. And the ending is also very heartwarming. Not going to mention any more as i want to keep it spoiler free.

Soundtrack: 8/10

 Reconstructing Science, all i have to say

 In all seriousness though, the soundtrack is honestly spectacular. It always sets the mood correctly and has a great electronic vibe to it. There are also some mini gameplay elements where when you jump or interact with certain things they produce a short gritty electro music loop. Which i absolutely adore.

 That pretty much concludes all the main elements i wanted to review. Theres so much left to be said but i dont want to drag this on any longer. So once again i want to express how much i love this game and i definitely reccommend it to anybody who hasnt experienced it before. I hope you enjoy it!
Online zevkli oluyor tek kişi sıkıc
Great game with excellent writing and good puzzles. Would recommend to anyone new to Steam (of course, play Portal 1 first though).
Portal 2 is a very engaging game that you can play on your own and with others which can make you laugh sometimes. Overall a very good game.

Gra jest idealna pod każdym względem.
Po pierwsze i najważniejsze, nie jest nudna, czyli grając chce się więcej.
Po drugie, dźwięk. Na zwykłej wbudowanej karcie Realteka. Jest znakomity. Efekt pukania do drzwi na początku gry. Nie wiem jak oni to zrobili, ale jak to usłyszałem (w słuchawkach) to byłem przekonany na 100%, że to nie z gry, tylko że ktoś puka do moich drzwi w domu. Po prostu słyszałem to pukanie z tylu za mną, jakieś 3 metry od drzwi. Nawet powiedziałem do swojej mamie, żeby zobaczyła kto to. Później (w grze) słyszałem coś podobnego już tylko 2 razy, nie chodziło o pukanie ale i tak zrobiło na mnie niesamowite wrażenie. Powtórzę, pierwszy raz słyszałem coś takiego w jakiejkolwiek grze.
Po trzecie grafika. Moim zdaniem wcale, ale to wcale nie jest zła.
To prawda, że source do najnowszych silników już nie należy, ale tu nie o to chodzi.
Bardzo podobała mi się gra cieni. Widać, ze efekt był zamierzony, ale i tak (a może właśnie dlatego) podobało mi się to bardzo.
No i wreszcie to co podobało mi się najbardziej w tej grafice, to brak "świecących" (bump mapping to się chyba nazywa) tekstur. Do tego dochodzi jeszcze (moim zdaniem) najładniejsza woda jaką widziałem do tej pory w jakiejkolwiek grze.

Nie podobało mi się natomiast, że gra była ....... dużo za krótka.

Reasumując, gra prawie idealna.
Mam nadzieję, ze to nie koniec, a dopiero początek tej serii. Chociaż Portal 3 po 9 latach dalej nie wyszedł :(
Moja ocena 10,5/10
love the way it makes me think and a lovely sequel
Niepowtarzalny humor, klimat i doświadczenie którego polecam doświadczyć

типичный симулятор человека которого заставляют искать туалет в лабиринте из тестовых комнат.Человек очень быстро проходит эти испытания но приходится сделать кирпичный дом в космосе потому-что Уитли пропердел весь комплекс и он скоро сломается как древний комп на котором запускают киберпан.И тут О КУРВА Гладос становится из картошки обратно в робота который понимает что ему КХ-КХ и спасает человека в надежде что он убежит из комплекса чтобы продолжать род.Но и тут О КУРВА.Человек поподает в хер пойми куда и от тудаже появляется куб который любит человека и вообще ему наКХ-КХ на то что он куб и недолжен ходить (но он все-таки ходит).И тут темнота и габен решил закончить эту игру и подкупил всех персонажей чтобы они что-то человеку сказали и песенку спели.Побольше бы таких игр.
